text.text_translated:
Knowing more about what people expect. Knowing more about how people act. This helps us avoid problems when we talk.
But it is very important to remember this. Stereotypes are simple ideas about people from a country. These ideas are often not true. They can be very bad for good business.
Culture from a country can change how we act and think. But many other things also change us a lot. For example, the place we live. The groups of people we are with. Our age. If we are a man or a woman. The culture at our job. Our own experiences in life.
So, we should know about these possible differences. We should remember them. But we must not use these ideas to put all people from one country into a small box.

best_attempt.text_translated:
We should know that people expect different things. They also act in different ways. This can help us. We can avoid problems when we talk.
But we must remember one important thing. Stereotypes are simple ideas about a group of people. These ideas are often not true. They can stop us from making good business relationships.

Culture from a country can change how we act and think. But other things also change us a lot.
We come from a place. This place changes us.
We spend time with people. These people change us.
Our age changes us.
If we are a man or a woman, this changes us.
Work culture changes us.
Our own life experiences change us.

So, we should know about these possible differences. We should remember them. But we should not use these ideas to think all people from one country are the same.
